DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate bioequivalence saxagliptin metformin saxagliptin , 5-mg/metformin extended-release ( XR ) , 500-mg , fixed-dose combination ( FDC ) tablet saxagliptin , 5-mg metformin , 500-mg XR tablet administer together fast fed state . In addition , demonstrate bioequivalence saxagliptin metformin saxagliptin , 5-mg/metformin XR , 1000-mg , FDC tablet saxagliptin , 5-mg metformin , 1000-mg XR tablet administer together fast fed state .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Fixed-dose Combinations Coadministered Individual Tablets Saxagliptin/Metformin-Brazil
DOC.criteria: Key Healthy men woman woman childbearing potential use acceptable method contraception Women pregnant nursing Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 29.9 kg/m^2 , inclusive . BMI=weight ( kg ) /height ( ) ^2 . Key Any significant acute chronic medical illness . History gastrointestinal ( GI ) disease Major surgery within 4 week study drug administration Any GI surgery could impact study drug absorption Donation blood plasma blood bank clinical study ( except screen visit ) within 6 month study drug administration . Blood transfusion within 3 month study drug administration woman within 2 month men Inability venipunctured and/or tolerate venous access Current smoker recent ( within 1 month ) history regular tobacco use Recent ( within 6 month study drug administration ) drug alcohol abuse Participation bioequivalence study within last 6 month study drug administration Estimated creatinine clearance < 80 mL/min use CockcroftGault formula History allergy drug class related compound History allergy metformin similar act agent History significant drug allergy
